item.s: RDF documents: how you can open local files or URIs
RDFS: to see, to change, to import vocabolaries
RDF Triples: to add and to change semantic RDF triples
The templates: What the templates are, how morla imports and uses them. How you can create new templates
The graphs: to transform a RDF Document in an image
The navigator: to surf between RDF Triples
Queries: morla supports 2 type of query languages (RDQL and SPARQL).
